doc.name: DistributedDirector
doc.description: The DistributedDirector extends Director to function on a distributed environment. It provides receivers of the type DistributedSDFReceiver. //TODO: Make it more generic that the type of receivers it provides can be changed in case different MoC are to be implemented.
doc.author: Daniel Lazaro Cuadrado (kapokasa@kom.aau.dk)
